Package icyllis.arc3d.engine

Class ClipStack

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.engine.Clip
icyllis.arc3d.engine.ClipStack
public final class ClipStack extends Clip
GPU hierarchical clipping.

We use scissor test and stencil test to apply clip, antialiasing only works on multisampled targets.

    • getConservativeBounds

      public void getConservativeBounds(Rect2i out)
      Description copied from class: Clip
      Compute a conservative pixel bounds restricted to the given render target dimensions. The returned bounds represent the limits of pixels that can be drawn; anything outside the bounds will be entirely clipped out.
      Specified by:
      getConservativeBounds in class Clip
